DOC.brief_summary: The aim study compare outcomes Transarterial Chemoembolization ( TACE ) plus Tegafur TACE alone patient intrahepatic cholangiocarcinoma curative resection
DOC.brief_title: TACE Plus Tegafur Versus TACE Intrahepatic Cholangiocarcinoma After Curative Resection
DOC.criteria: Male female patient > 18 year < =70 year age . Pathological evidence ICC Tumors completely resect . Criteria liver function : Child AB level , serum bilirubin ≤ 1.5 time upper limit normal value , alanine aminotransferase aspartate aminotransferase ≤ 2 time upper limit normal value . Patients understand trial sign information consent . Tumors resect . Patients apparent cardiac , pulmonary , cerebral renal dysfunction , may affect treatment Intrahepatic cholangiocarcinoma . Patients medical history malignant tumor . Subjects participate clinical trial . Liver function : Child C .
